verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of the sons of Korah. Oh clap <WH8628> your hands <WH3709>, all ye peoples <WH5971>; Shout <WH7321> unto God <WH430> with the voice <WH6963> of triumph <WH7440>.
For Jehovah <WH3068> Most High <WH5945> is terrible <WH3372>; He is a great <WH1419> King <WH4428> over all the earth <WH776>.
He subdueth <WH1696> peoples <WH5971> under us <WH5971>, And nations under our feet <WH7272>.
He chooseth <WH977> our inheritance <WH5159> for us <WH1347>, The glory of Jacob <WH3290> whom he loved <WH157>. Selah <WH5542>
God <WH430> is gone up <WH5927> with a shout <WH8643>, Jehovah <WH3068> with the sound <WH6963> of a trumpet <WH7782>.
Sing praise <WH2167> to God <WH430>, sing praises <WH2167>: Sing praises <WH2167> unto our King <WH4428>, sing praises <WH2167>.
For God <WH430> is the King <WH4428> of all the earth <WH776>: Sing ye praises <WH2167> with understanding <WH7919>.
God <WH430> reigneth <WH4427> over the nations <WH1471>: God <WH430> sitteth <WH3427> upon his holy <WH6944> throne <WH3678>.

The princes <WH5081> of the peoples <WH5971> are gathered together <WH622> To be the people <WH5971> of the God <WH430> of Abraham <WH85>: For the shields <WH4043> of the earth <WH776> belong unto God <WH430>; He is greatly <WH3966> exalted <WH5927>.
